statements: SELECT id, modality, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'Fingerprint';
SELECT id, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE template_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT modality, COUNT(*) AS count FROM biometric_templates GROUP BY modality;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT modality, COUNT(*) FROM biometric_templates GROUP BY modality;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'fingerprint';
SELECT id, modality FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY modality DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, modality, LENGTH(template_data) AS data_length FROM biometric_templates WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE modality = 'fingerprints';
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY modality ASC;
SELECT id, modality FROM biometric_templates WHERE id = 'd1a8eb49-4df3-4f1f-8595-0ec01fd4b6c7';
SELECT user_id, modality FROM users JOIN biometric_templates ON users.modality = biometric_templates.modality;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'fingerprint' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE modality = 'iris' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, template FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'face' AND id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' AND modality = 'voice' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE modality = 'fingervein' AND username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates;
SELECT template_id, modality FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT iris_scan_id, template_id FROM iris_scans WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT voice_id, voice_data FROM voice_recognition WHERE voice_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'Fingerprint';
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, modality FROM biometric_templates WHERE modality = 'Fingerprint' ORDER BY template_id ASC;
SELECT iris_scan_id, iris_data FROM iris_scans WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT voice_id, voice_data FROM voice_recognition WHERE template_id = 2 ORDER BY voice_id DESC;

SELECT biometric_templates.template_id, modality, voice_data FROM biometric_templates INNER JOIN voice_recognition ON biometric_templates.template_id = voice_recognition.template_id ORDER BY biometric_templates.template_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates_iris;
SELECT id, iris_data FROM biometric_templates_voice ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT type_id, modality_name FROM biometric_types WHERE type_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates_hand_geometry WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, voice_sample FROM biometric_templates_voice WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates_iris WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, voice_sample FROM biometric_templates_voice WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT type_id, modality_name FROM biometric_types WHERE modality_name LIKE 'iris%';
SELECT id, hand_geometry_data FROM biometric_templates_hand_geometry ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT type_id, modality_name FROM biometric_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM iris_scans;
SELECT iris_id, iris_template FROM iris_scans WHERE iris_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM voice_recognition ORDER BY voice_id DESC;
SELECT hand_id FROM hand_geometry WHERE hand_template IS NOT NULL;
SELECT fingerprint_id, fingerprint_template FROM fingerprints LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM iris_scans WHERE iris_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT voice_id, voice_template FROM voice_recognition WHERE voice_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
SELECT hand_id, hand_template FROM hand_geometry ORDER BY hand_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fingerprints LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT face_id, face_template FROM face_recognition WHERE face_id IN ('98765432-abcdef-0123-4567-89abcdef1234','543210ab-cdef-0123-4567-89ab-cdef12345678');
